trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Hueytown
There were no other sightings in Hueytown on or around April 15th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsOne evening I was outside looking at the stars, the sky was fairly clear. To the southeast of my location (I am near Birmingham) I suddenly spotted what had to be an extremely large oval shaped red flash of light. When I say extremely large, I would relate this to the size of a city or state considering how high up in the sky this light was located. It was a plasma looking red flash of light which spread out and then disappeared.
